data: CONSENT: Discuss and obtain client consent and ensure the client understands what they are giving consent to and has had the opportunity to ask questions prior to signing the consent form.
M-ESLON may be ordered at half of community Kadian dose if client can commit to 5 hours observation post-dose
If ordering dose(s) outside the protocol (i.e. greater than 150 mg/dose for PRN), contact RAAC Medical Lead or designate to determine next steps
dose range: 50 to 150 mg, PO, q1h, PRN other (see comment), drug form: oral liq
Assess and document Pasero Opioid-Induced Sedation Scale (POSS) score every 15 minutes for 1 hour after each dose of morphine oral liquid
Assess and document Respiratory Rate every 15 minutes for 1 hour after each dose of morphine oral liquid
Assess and document O2 Saturation every 15 minutes for 1 hour after each dose of morphine oral liquid
0.1 mg, IM, q2min, PRN reverse opioid effect, drug form: inj
0.4 mg, IM, q2min, PRN reverse opioid effect, drug form: inj
